item.description:
October 23, 2010 6:30 - 8:30

Event: Hello from Heaven Mediumship Event with Diana Harris
Location: ZuZu's Healing Arts
122 West Emerson St.
Melrose, MA
Information: Join Diana for an intimate evening of connecting with your loved ones, friends & pets that have ?passed on? in a small group setting. Everyone is ensured personal attention and receives a message. Group readings are excellent forums for opening up to the process of mediumship and learning about ?life after life? in an environment that is gentle, safe and supportive. Quite often, those who attend find that they share a common bond with others in the group. Sometimes, new friendships are formed or a message directed to another participant is exactly what you need to hear to help your healing. Nothing is by chance! Similar to John Edwards ?Crossing Over? but on a more intimate scale.

Seating is very limited at this event! Please contact us at 781-665-8844 to register and reserve your spot, cost is $60 per person.
item.name: Group medium reading in Melrose
